I enjoy building functional, efficient, and thoughtfully designed web applications that are empowering to people by using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Also, I tend to work remotely.

There are even some great engineers that think I'm good at handling the user interface.

I love coffee, Jeep Wranglers, and waffles.
